meta.title: Mad Artist
meta.description: Where creativity meets curiosity - designing worlds, one idea at a time.

about: I'm a graphic designer and visual artist based in Warsaw, with a degree in Graphic Design from WIT Academy. I'm passionate about bringing ideas to life through both digital and traditional art, blending imagination with technical skill.

I'm a fast learner who loves experimenting, exploring new tools, and finding creative ways to tell visual stories. Collaboration energizes me â€” I enjoy working in a team and turning shared ideas into strong, visually engaging projects.
Outside of work, I'm inspired by fantasy worlds and spend my free time illustrating, designing characters, and playing video games.

experience.title: Graphic Designer Intern - ANTERIS Irena Kucharska
bullets: Designed templates and layouts for print projects
Created illustrations and refined photo treatments for production use
Used Midjourney AI to generate concept imagery and finished assets in Adobe Photoshop
Contributed to the creative development of visual materials for print and digital media

soft: Strong adaptability to new tools and techniques
Development of unique, visually cohesive projects

education: WIT Academy, Warsaw - Graphic Design / Multimedia
